[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The E-Store defines requirements for browsing, cart management, and secure checkout.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: E-Store supports online shopping with search and secure payments.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: E-Store integrates with payment gateways, external APIs, and third-party shipping services.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: E-Store provides web and mobile interfaces for customers and admin dashboards.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: E-Store operates on modern servers with Intel Core i5/AMD Ryzen 5 processors or higher.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: E-Store is compatible with modern browsers and integrates with backend frameworks.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: E-Store ensures secure communication via HTTPS.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: E-Store operates efficiently with 8GB RAM or higher.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: E-Store manages product inventory, order processing, and user data securely.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: E-Store supports multi-currency and multi-language configurations.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: E-Store integrates analytics and email tools.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: E-Store enables product browsing, shopping cart management, secure payments, and personalized recommendations.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: E-Store is designed for customers, administrators, and vendors with basic internet proficiency.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: E-Store needs stable internet and supported devices.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: E-Store assumes the availability of secure payment gateways, supported browsers, and modern databases.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Shopping Cart: Stores selected products before checkout.
[SUBSEC] 1.9 Acronyms and Abbreviations: PCI DSS: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate payment gateways for secure transactions.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall offer REST APIs for product access.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall allow users to browse and search for products (REQ-INTF-10).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall add products to a shopping cart (REQ-INTF-002).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall process secure purchases (REQ-INTF-44).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-004: The system shall recommend products using browsing history (REQ-INTF-40).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide a responsive UI.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall load pages within 3 seconds.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall support 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store user, order, and product data securely.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The system shall automate database backups and restore data.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with responsive web design standards.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to PCI DSS standards for payment processing security.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall ensure 99.9% uptime and receive system feedback within 1 second (REQ-USAB-001).

[SEC] 3. Verification: Unit, integration, and security tests shall validate workflows, transactions, and system performance.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User manuals, API documentation, and configuration guidelines.
[SEC] 5. References: E-Store User Guide, PCI DSS Compliance Guidelines, and Web Usability Standards.
